name: List
title: Gcloud
Logging
Metric
List
description: Metric::List is a special case Array with additional values.

methods.name: token
title: Gcloud
Logging
Metric
List#token
methods.description: If not empty, indicates that there are more records that match the request and this value should be passed to continue.

methods.name: token=
title: Gcloud
Logging
Metric
List#token=
methods.description: If not empty, indicates that there are more records that match the request and this value should be passed to continue.

methods.name: next?
title: Gcloud
Logging
Metric
List#next?
methods.description: Whether there is a next page of metrics.

methods.name: all
title: Gcloud
Logging
Metric
List#all
methods.description: Retrieves all metrics by repeatedly loading #next? until #next? returns false. Returns the list instance for method chaining.

examples.code:
require "gcloud"

gcloud = Gcloud.new
logging = gcloud.logging
all_metrics = logging.metrics.all # Load all pages of metrics
